dict.string:
# if there's no file, create a tmp file if [[ -z "$TM_FILEPATH" ]]; then TM_RUBYMATE_TMPFILE=$(mktemp -t rubymate) fi
# save file, add shebang if it's missing (RubyMate needs it) { read SHEBANG # if [[ "${SHEBANG:0:2}" != "#!" ]]; then # echo "#!${TM_RUBY:-/usr/bin/env ruby}" # fi echo "$SHEBANG"; cat; } >"${TM_FILEPATH:=$TM_RUBYMATE_TMPFILE}"
[[ ${TM_WARN_LEVEL:-0} > 0 ]] && w='-w' || w='' ${TM_RUBY:-ruby} $w -- "$TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT/tmruby.rb" "$TM_FILEPATH"
# remove our potential tmp file if [[ -e "$TM_RUBYMATE_TMPFILE" ]]; then rm "$TM_RUBYMATE_TMPFILE" fi
